About.title: About Simple Portfolio App
About.subtitle: A comprehensive technical showcase demonstrating production-grade full-stack development, security hardening, and DevOps practices.
About.description: Simple Portfolio App is more than a financial portfolio tracker — it's a production-grade technical demonstration built with the same standards as enterprise software. From clean architecture to Kubernetes deployment, every layer is designed to showcase real-world engineering expertise.
About.demonstrates_subtitle: A deep dive into the technical competencies behind this application.
About.demo_fullstack_desc: Next.js + TypeScript frontend with server/client components, Python/FastAPI backend with SQLAlchemy 2.0, and PostgreSQL database — all production-ready.
About.demo_polyglot_desc: The same RESTful API implemented in multiple languages: Python (complete), Go (in progress), with Node.js, Java, and PHP planned.
About.demo_architecture_desc: Domain-Driven Design, separation of concerns, API-first development with OpenAPI 3.1 specification, and consistent response patterns.
About.demo_devops_desc: Kubernetes (microk8s) deployment, Docker multi-stage builds, CI/CD with GitHub Actions, and database migrations with golang-migrate.
About.demo_security_desc: JWT auth with HttpOnly cookies, OWASP Top 10 compliance, SAST/DAST with SonarQube, dependency scanning with Snyk, and secure password hashing (argon2).
About.demo_quality_desc: 85%+ test coverage (unit + integration), linting, code quality tools, and comprehensive API documentation.
About.why_desc: Most portfolio projects are simple CRUD demos. I wanted to go further — to build something that reflects how I actually work: with proper architecture, security hardening, real deployment infrastructure, and production-grade testing. This project exists to prove that I can take a concept from design to production with the same rigor expected in enterprise environments.
About.why_point_1: Showcase production-grade development skills across the full stack
About.why_point_2: Demonstrate secure, scalable system design from a cybersecurity background
About.why_point_3: Go beyond typical demos with real architecture, CI/CD, and Kubernetes deployment
About.why_point_4: Prove expertise in modern technologies and industry best practices
About.tech_subtitle: A robust, production-grade stack organized by domain.
About.tech_frontend_items: Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, TanStack Query, next-intl
About.tech_backend_items: Python / FastAPI, SQLAlchemy 2.0, Pydantic v2, JWT (HttpOnly cookies), argon2
About.tech_infra_items: PostgreSQL, Docker (multi-stage), Kubernetes (microk8s), GitHub Actions CI/CD, golang-migrate
About.roadmap_subtitle: Ongoing development to expand the technical scope.
About.explore_subtitle: Dive into the source code, architecture, and documentation.
About.explore_source_desc: Browse the full repository on GitHub
About.opensource_desc: This project is open source under the MIT License. Check out the source code and contribute on GitHub.
About.author_education: M2 Cybersecurity and Legal IT (Université Grenoble-Alpes)
About.author_experience: Former Tech Lead & DevOps at Black Pearl (2022-2025)
About.author_desc: Specializing in secure, scalable applications with expertise in full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, and security hardening. Passionate about clean architecture and production-grade engineering.
